ygData.subject: Re: Sol A
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/10/99 12:55:49 PM Eastern Daylight Time, DWHITCRAFT@cerner.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/10/99 12:55:49 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
DWHITCRAFT@... writes:

<< Anyone have a map or guide or even seen one for Solusk A? I haven't been
able to find squat...

Or, any info would be nice... How many things would there be to fight at
32nd level? Could I safely go in an check things out without getting
attacked by every other mob there? Normal Invis work or there undead types?

Thanks >>

You could do well in the Bartender room with a good group or even solo maybe.
Bartender spawns fairly often and drops Drake Hide Leggings. I was only
23rd lvl when I camped the bar room with 2 full groups of guildmates. There
is also a Goblin Drunkard that drops a foreman tunic I think. I just
scratched the surface of SOL A and I know there is a lot of other good stuff
there. I saw no Undead there, but there are spellcasting gobs like in
Runnyeye who may be able to see invisi.

Just so you know, Sol A can get real rough. While we held the bar room for 5
hours with only one death (er, me - thank god for resurections) and got 7
pairs of drake hide leggings (wohooo!) in the final hour (the 6th) our 32 lvl
Monk went to pull and somehow came back with a huge train. I mean HUGE!!!
and then the room spawn occured. AHHHHHHH. The battle raged for about 7
minutes and in the end, 11 guildmates, half over lvl 30, lay dead and one
frail, scared out of his robe wizard sat medding (no mana to gate -
ahhhhhhhh) surrounded by 3 goblins who survived. The gobs just stood over me
not attacking as I tried to med up enough mana to gate. I've never been so
scared in my life. Afraid to stand up and gate for fear of gaining thier
attention, I cried for help to the other folks in the dungeon - no help came.
I decided to go for the gate, standing up literally under the chin of a
goblin wizard, I appprehensivley began reciting the words for my gate spell
hoping the gobs would not hear. They did not, or they wanted me to live so I
could spread the word about the worst massacre I've ever seen. Safely gating
back to High Hold Keep, I have yet to return to Sol A, but will revenge my
bothers deaths someday.

Wizaro WrathCaster
Solusek Ro
